results.title: Simvastatin attenuates testicular injury induced by torsion-detorsion.
results.text_hl: We elucidated the potential of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ to attenuate @DISEASE_Testicular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D013733 @@@testicular injury@@@ induced by @<m>DISEASE_Spermatic_Cord_Torsion</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013086 @@@testicular torsion@@@-detorsion.

citations.NLM: Yang S, Shih HJ, Chow YC, Wang TY, Tsai PS, Huang CJ. Simvastatin attenuates testicular injury induced by torsion-detorsion. J Urol. 2010 Aug;184(2):750-6. PMID: 20639051
